pages.text: Owing to its new method of access via the Stargate Network, the Gatekeeper NPC and associated structure have been disabled.$(br2)As well, Blue Skies awful tool+armor nerf nonsense has been disabled courtesy of the mod Lue Kie, from Roxxane019 (Thank you <3)
The Blue Journal can now be obtained via crafting 4 pieces of Blue Skies cobblestone surrounding a book.
